Class Location

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Location in Battlehack 2017

    • Field Detail

      • x

        public final int x
        The x-coordinate. Follows standard math (x,y) -- 0,0 is bottom left, +x is to the right

      • y

        public final int y
        The y-coordinate. Follows standard math (x,y) -- 0,0 is bottom left, +x is up

      • tileDistanceTo

        public int tileDistanceTo(Location other)
        The tile distance is the number of tiles you must cross to reach the other location, if you can cross to any tile from a tile that touches it. (How most movement works)
        Parameters:
        other - Another location
        Returns:
        The tile distance to that location (# touch-moves)
